levels.details: The NTP process has been restored to normal operation.
levels.cause: The NTP process has been restored to normal operation. The previously issued alarm has been cleared.
levels.effect: Normal process monitoring operations have been restored.

levels.details: Upstart has detected that the NTP process has failed. A restart will automatically be attempted. If this alarm does not clear, an unrecoverable failure may have occurred.
levels.cause: The system has detected that the NTP process has failed.
levels.effect: Constant monitoring of processes has stopped. Process failures will not be detected until Monit is restored to service and the alarm is cleared.
levels.action: Monitor for this alarm to clear. If it does not clear then contact your support representative.
